name: Aging Room - Core Habano - Major
additionalNotes: The Aging Room Core Habano cigar is a complex and balanced smoke that features a bold Habano wrapper surrounding a premium blend of Dominican binder and filler tobaccos. These medium to full-bodied gems are Dominican puros - a dark Dominican Habano wrapper, Dominican binder, and long-fillers. They have an earthy flavor profile with notes of dark fruit, baking spices, and leather. The cigars are blended by Rafael Nodal and Jochy Blanco of Tabacalera La Palma in Tamboril, Dominican Republic.
